name: Outposts
description:
Play this mobile FPS and unlock new bases and difficulties! Choose between stealth and finishing without alerting enemies or going crazy and shooting everyone without thinking about tomorrow.

Controls:

Use touch and move the character, shoot by touching the bullet icon, reload and crouch by touching the respective icons.

Don't forget to choose the best weapons and equipment for your mission!


Feel free to send us feedback here or at contact@yellowpanda.games 

Last apk version v1.0.1
